Feature: Soft internal padding and tough outer shells add excellent protection
ItemAttributes.Label: Pacific Cycle
ItemAttributes.Title: Mongoose BMX Bike Gel Knee and Elbow Pad Set

EditorialReview.Content:
view larger

Pushing your limits and breaking new ground can lead to some bumps-- that's where Mongoose BMX Bike Gel Knee and Elbow Pads come in. Soft internal padding and tough outer shells add excellent protection when you're learning to ride or skate.

About Mongoose

For almost 40 years, Mongoose has been in the dirt, on the trails and off the ramps. Founded in 1974 in a Southern California garage, Mongoose has always been an aggressive brand with products that push the limits of what a rider can do. From the biggest hits on the mountain or in the park to the urban jungle, Mongoose is an authentic brand that produces durable products built for real riders. From the first products - to their current crop of BMX, Mountain and pavement bikes, Mongoose is synonymous with bikes that perform on the smoothest single track to the biggest drops and riders looking for trails that never end and keep the party going.

ItemAttributes.Label: Bell
ItemAttributes.Title: Bell Faction Bike Helmet (Matte Black, Small)

EditorialReview.Content: The Bell Faction sets a new standard in skate-inspired helmets with superior style, fit and comfort. Two signature colors each from Dave Mirra and Tony Hawk along with eight other inspired designs.

Bell Fraction Multi-Sport Helmet for Kids

The Bell Fraction multi-sport helmet brings the same skate-style cool of its older brother to the pint-sized set. Just like the big Faction, the Fraction is dual certified for skate and bike use. The Fraction features the same tough ABS plastic shell as the Faction that is well suited to the trial of on and off use. Meanwhile, the dual-density EPS foam provides a low-profile fit without sacrificing protection. Finally, 12 vents in the roof keep little heads cool and comfortable on the ride. Offered in a wide array of colors and graphics, there is sure to be a Fraction helmet that your young rider will want to wear.

TECHNOLOGIES

ABS HARD PLASTIC SHELL: ABS plastic offers the extreme durability required of skate-style helmets that see a lot of on-and-off use.

DUAL DENSITY EPS FOAM: Bell uses Dual Density foam in their skate-style helmets to tune the energy dispersion qualities of the liner for the rigors of both bicycle and skate use.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Weight: 404 grams / 14.3 ounces
  • Vents: 12
  • Certifications: ASTM 1492, CE EN1078, CPSC BICYCLE

FIT GUIDE

  • X Small: 48 to 53 centimeters
  • Small: 51 to 56 centimeters
